message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a price of $14,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price point, considering its potential benefits for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I can't go below $13,750 for this product. I believe it's a fair price considering its potential value to you.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,500.
